title: Galaxy S22 Ultra is the Note reborn – S Pen slot, 5,000 mAh battery, and 45W charging for $1,199
content:
The Galaxy Note is dead. Long live the Galaxy Note. Samsung just rebooted its popular Galaxy Note series by merging the design and signature S Pen into its new Galaxy S22 Ultra.

more…

The post Galaxy S22 Ultra is the Note reborn – S Pen slot, 5,000 mAh battery, and 45W charging for $1,199 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung has officially unveiled the Galaxy S22 Ultra as its reboot of the Galaxy Note series, with a built-in S Pen and more.
